author: Reuters Editorial
title: Exelixis Announces Results From A Phase 2 Trial Of Cabozantinib In The First-Line Treatment Of Metastatic Radioiodine-Refractory Differentiated Thyroid Carcinoma
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Exelixis Inc:
* EXELIXIS ANNOUNCES RESULTS FROM A PHASE 2 INVESTIGATOR-SPONSORED TRIAL OF CABOZANTINIB IN THE FIRST-LINE TREATMENT OF METASTATIC RADIOIODINE-REFRACTORY DIFFERENTIATED THYROID CARCINOMA
* EXELIXIS INC - ‍EXELIXIS PLANS TO INITIATE A PIVOTAL PHASE 3 TRIAL LATER THIS YEAR​
* EXELIXIS INC - ‍54 PERCENT OBJECTIVE RESPONSE RATE AND 43 PERCENT STABLE DISEASE OBSERVED AMONG 35 EVALUABLE PATIENTS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
